product_overview: Testsprite Developer Modal is a UI/UX component showcasing the team members of a legal AI product with innovative 3D scroll animations and smooth interaction handling to enhance user engagement and information presentation.
core_goals: Provide a visually engaging modal to present team members with 3D scroll animation effects
Ensure smooth and responsive interaction across devices including mobile and desktop
Implement robust image loading with error handling for team member pictures
Maintain consistent theming and accessibility support including dark mode and keyboard navigation
Optimize performance to achieve smooth animations at 60fps with low memory footprint
Support independent animations for multiple container sections inside the modal
key_features: Modal component displaying team members including a guide and developers with detailed information
3D scroll-based animation that rotates cards forward or backward depending on scroll direction and position
Smooth open and close modal transitions with backdrop overlay
Image loading with fallback UI on load failure to avoid broken visuals
Responsive design that adjusts layout and animation for mobile and desktop viewports
Dark mode compatibility with readable text and styled backdrops
Accessibility support with keyboard navigations, ARIA labels, and screen reader compatibility
Multiple independently animated container sections for Guide and Developer profiles
Styled with Tailwind CSS and enhanced using Framer Motion animations
Performance benchmarks to ensure 60fps and under 50MB memory usage per modal instance
user_flow_summary: User clicks 'Developer' button in navigation bar to open Developer Modal
Modal displays with smooth fade-in animation and backdrop
User scrolls inside modal, triggering 3D card rotations that tilt cards forward when scrolling down and backward when scrolling up
User views guide details including image and label at top section
User scrolls to developer sections and views developer images and names with their own independent scroll animations
User can close modal with close button or Escape key, modal closes smoothly with animation
User toggles dark mode which updates modal styling accordingly
User accesses modal on different devices and viewport sizes, experiencing responsive layout and animations that adapt to device capabilities
validation_criteria: Modal opens and closes with smooth animations and proper backdrop display
3D scroll animations correctly tilt cards forward on downward scroll and backward on upward scroll with angles ranging from ±20° to 0°
All developer and guide images load correctly with fallback UI on errors
Scroll animations perform smoothly at 60fps without frame drops or jitter on desktop and mobile
Modal layout adapts responsively with appropriate sizes and scaling on mobile and desktop screens
Dark mode styling ensures text readability and consistent modal appearance
Keyboard navigation and screen reader support is fully functional with correct ARIA labels and accessible focus order
Multiple container animations operate independently without cross-interference
No memory leaks occur after multiple modal open/close cycles as checked by browser tools
Performance benchmarks such as initial load time under 500ms and image load times under 2 seconds are met
